text: José María Vallsera (born 24 June 1919) is a retired Colombian sports shooter. He competed in the 50 metre rifle, three positions event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:Possibly living people Category:Colombian male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Colombia Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Bogotá
title: José María Vallsera
